dataset.title: Persona Consistent Chatbot Dataset
dataset.description: This dataset contains various conversational datasets used for training a persona-consistent chatbot. It includes PersonaChat, Blended Skill Talk, and custom persona dialogues.

files.name: personachat
files.description: Original dataset containing 162k utterances for persona-based conversations.

files.name: blended_skill_talk
files.description: Dataset containing blended skill conversations for training.

files.name: custom_personas
files.description: Custom persona dialogues created for specific use cases.

dataset.citation: Please cite this dataset as follows: [Your Citation Here]
